bike.description: Full high modulus carbon fiber, Dyad Ultra lay-up, tri-oval shaped top and down tubes with SST tubing diameters, 1 1/8-1 1/2" head tube, PressFit 30 BB shell, asymmetrical chainstays, twin seat stays with rack mounts, forged one-piece dropouts with replaceable derailleur hanger and eyelet

components.description: Jamis full carbon composite, 1.5" hollow formed crown, alloy dropouts with one eyelet
Shimano RS30 wheelset, 16/20H, 30mm rim profile, RS30 forged aluminum loose ball hubs and double butted bladed stainless steel spokes
Shimano Ultegra RD-6700 rear and Ultegra FD-6700 braze-on front with 34.9mm alloy clamp
Shimano Ultegra ST- 6700 Dual Control STI, 20-Speed
Ritchey Comp 4-Axis, 3D net forged 6061 alloy, 6JAMIS_DEGREE x 90mm (48/51), 100mm (54/56), 120mm (58/61)
Ritchey Pro Carbon, 31.6 x 350mm with Jamis 7075-AL CNC aluminum 1-bolt seat post clamp
Selle San Marco Ponza Power Arrowhead with Microfeel cover and hollow cro-moly rails
